cmp: 子 (11 p.m.-1 a.m./1st earthly branch/child/midnight/son/child/seed/egg/small thing, (noun suff.))
mng: filial piety or obedience, mourning apparel

exm.mng: filial piety (Confucian virtue), to be a good son or daughter
filial piety, to be obedient to one's parents
to show filial respect, to give presents (to one's elders or superiors), to support one's aged parents
